content: 7 6 decrease 6 7 6 decrease 6 leave a long end and close leave a long end and close 2nd front leg belly skip 3 stitches from the last leg join yarn in one of the back stit- towards the front and join your ches between the legs we will brown yarn in the 3rd stitch single_crochet 6 work in the round between the then ch6 and join in the 1st single_crochet to legs to close the body create a circle 1 *2 single_crochet 1 decrease* x8 2 single_crochet 26 2 *1 single_crochet 1 decrease* x8 2sc 18 1-4 12 single_crochet 12 3 *1 decrease* x9 8 switch to white yarn 5 12 single_crochet 12 leave a long end and close switch to black yarn 6 12 single_crochet 12 7 6 decrease 6 leave a long end and close tail carpet with brown yarn chain 7 and leave with pink yarn a long tail at the beginning of the chain for sewing fasten_off 1 chain 11 2 single_crochet in 2nd chain from cut 5 small strands of black yarn hook single_crochet in next 8 sttiches 4 single_crochet around 10cm or smaller in next stitch single_crochet in next 8 stitch pass a strand through the last 2 single_crochet in last stitch chain with your hook forming a 2 1 single_crochet 1 increase 8 single_crochet 1 increase 2 single_crochet 1 increase loop and pass the loop through 8 single_crochet 1 in 1sc the 2 strands of yarn forming a slip_stitch and fasten_off knot join the white yarn repeat with the 4 other strands 3 1 single_crochet in each stitch then cut to your desired length sew on the back of the body mane halter repeat the same process as the for each part leave a long end tail with black yarn on the back on both ends for sewing of the head first part chain 16 join to form a circle sew around the muzzle second part ch3 join to form a circle sew in front of the ears 3rd part make 2 chain 6 sew between the 2 other parts to join them
